definition: to seize the opportune moment/to lose no time

sentences.english: He has also missed no opportunity to belittle his Republicanconfrères.
sentences.chinese: 他還不失時機地貶低他的共和黨兄弟們。

sentences.english: To him that does everything in its proper time, one day is worth three.
sentences.chinese: 辦事不失時機，一天可抵三天用。

sentences.english: And the functionaries of the Comintern lost no time in realigning themselves.
sentences.chinese: 共產國際的官員們不失時機地重組自身。
